title: RX queue
extract: The card assigns a transmit (TX) and receive (RX) ring buffer. As the name implies, the ring buffer is a circular buffer where an overflow simply overwrites existing data. ... The RX ring buffer is used to store incoming packets until they can be processed by the device driver.Mar 25, 2015
extract_html: The card assigns a transmit (TX) and receive (RX) ring buffer. As the name implies, the ring buffer is a circular buffer where an overflow simply overwrites existing data. ... The RX ring buffer is used to store incoming packets until they can be processed by the device driver.Mar 25, 2015
